app.title: Authenticator
app.ready: Ready to secure your digital life.
app.enter_key: Enter a secret key above to generate your first 2FA code.

add_form.paste_secret_collapsed: Paste 2FA Secret Key to add new...

account_row.delete_desc: Are you sure you want to remove <1>{{label}}</1>? This action cannot be undone.

help_dialog.title: Important Security Notice
help_dialog.subtitle: Understanding how your data is stored and how to protect it.
help_dialog.storage_desc: Your 2FA codes are stored <1>directly on this browser</1> (localStorage). We do <3>NOT</3> upload your data to any cloud server. This ensures maximum privacy but comes with risks.
help_dialog.risk_desc: You will lose ALL your codes if you:
help_dialog.risk_2: Uninstall this browser or reinstall Windows/MacOS.
help_dialog.rec_desc: Always use the <1>Settings {{icon}} > Export Backup</1> feature immediately after adding new accounts. Keep the backup file in a safe place (Cloud, USB).

backup.title: Data Management
backup.import_info: No new accounts found to import (duplicates skipped)
